snippet: HBO said on Wednesday that it is ending further production on its high-profile drama "Luck," one day after the announcement that a third horse involved in the show had been injured and euthanized.
abstract: HBO said on Wednesday that it is ending further production on its high-profile drama "Luck," one day after the announcement that a third horse involved in the show had been injured and euthanized.

headline.print_headline: After a Third Horse Dies, HBO Stops Filming ‘Luck’
